data.text:
@MassDPH The CDCs response to a two-year-old boy who died within 6 hours: “bleeding out of the mouth, eyes, nose and ears within six hours” of his first dose of Pfizer’s COVID-19 vaccine on 11/18/21. 

“A search of our records failed to reveal any documents pertaining to your request.” https://t.co/nOCOoFuJbb

@MassDPH I hope parents have done their due diligence now. The government has never & will never tell you everything about it or the virus. 
It's the parent's job, not the govt's to do what's right for your kids.
@MassDPH It's amazing that you are still peddling this garbage.
